item.title: FT Most Read: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Ukraine’s Kursk offensive has triggered doubts among Russian elite, spy chiefs say
2. Apple’s new iPhone will use Arm’s next-generation chip technology for AI
3. [Opinion] The middlebrow trap
4. UK health minister says NHS needs to make ‘three big shifts’ to survive
5. Power struggle looms at Chelsea FC as US co-owners’ relationship sours
item.guid: FT Most Read: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
